resources.string: Accuracy of tag locations depends on GPS/Network availability. It may take up to few minutes to sync.
Please setup your Twitter user-name and password in preferences to post new reviews.

CREATE TABLE REVIEWS ( id integer primary key, heading String, description String, is_like integer, image_url String, latitude String, longitude String, review_date String, username String, location_name String); CREATE TABLE PENDING_REVIEWS ( id integer primary key, heading String, description String, is_like integer, image_url String, image_path String, latitude String, longitude String, review_date, username String, location_name String, creation_date Date, errors String, status String, retries integer);
